text: Barriers Burned Away is a 1925 American silent historical drama film directed by W.S. Van Dyke and starring Mabel Ballin, Eric Mayne and Frank Mayo.Munden p.40 It is set at the time of the Great Chicago Fire in 1871. The film was loosely adapted from the novel of the same name by Edward Payson Roe, published in 1872. ==Cast== {| class="wikitable" ! Actors !!
